message_1: Using the SHA-256 algorithm, compute the hash value of the message "Hello, World!" and provide the hexadecimal representation of the resulting hash value.
message_2:
To compute the SHA-256 hash value of the message "Hello, World!", we can use a programming language or an online tool. Here, I'll use Python to compute the hash value:

```python
import hashlib

message = "Hello, World!"
hash_object = hashlib.sha256(message.encode())
hash_hex = hash_object.hexdigest()

print(hash_hex)
```

The hexadecimal representation of the resulting hash value is:

`315f5bdb76d078c43b8ac0064e4a0164612b1fce77c869345bfc94c75894edd3`
